name: Hyacinthia, Eye of Twilight
description:
This is what the demigod who mended the dawn with their smile looks like after they have been enveloped by the black tide. Although the brilliance of the Coreflame has been clouded, warmth still lingers â€”
The healer never wants to annihilate their old friend, instead vowing to disperse the gloomy clouds in the friend's heart.

skills.name: Ashes to the Distant Shore
skills.description: <u>Reinstates</u> "Languid Ethmoid Bone" and deals a set amount of massive Imaginary DMG to one designated target, while inflicting "<u>Rot</u>" to them. "<u>Rot</u>" is stackable.

skills.name: Extinguishment of the Savaged Star
skills.description: <u>Reinstates</u> "Dried Lacrimal Bone" and deals a set amount of massive Imaginary DMG to all targets. The DMG is <u>distributed evenly</u> among the targets.

skills.name: Eye of Terror
skills.description: Enters "The Dark Tides Cometh" state. In the next action, uses "Unmaking Ashes: Godsfall" and <u>reinstates</u> "Languid Ethmoid Bone" and "Dried Lacrimal Bone."

skills.name: Unmaking Ashes: Godsfall
skills.description: Deals a set amount of massive Imaginary DMG to all targets, and <u>reinstates</u> "Languid Ethmoid Bone" and "Dried Lacrimal Bone."

skills.name: Remnants
skills.description: When inflicting DMG to "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" during this battle, an equal amount of HP will also be lost by "Hyacinthia, Eye of Twilight." When "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" receive a killing blow, "Hyacinthia, Eye of Twilight" will receive Toughness DMG, and "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" will restore HP and cannot be selected.

skills.name: Black Tide
skills.description: Adds "Black Tide" to Action Order. Every time the "Black Tide" takes action, inflicts all targets with "<u>Rot</u>." "<u>Rot</u>" is stackable. When targets suffer fatal damage, inflicts "<u>Tide-Corrosion</u>" on them and Charges "Healing Rainbow." When all targets enter the "<u>Tide-Corrosion</u>" state or are downed, the battle ends in defeat.

skills.name: Tides Below
skills.description: During this battle, all DMG dealt by "Hyacinthia, Eye of Twilight" will deal a set amount of DMG based on "Black Tide Sync Rate." After a target uses an attack, additionally deals "<u>Non-fatal</u>" <u>True DMG</u> based on "Black Tide Sync Rate." When "Hyacinthia, Eye of Twilight" and "Black Tide" take action, increases "Black Tide Sync Rate." When "Languid Ethmoid Bone" or "Dried Lacrimal Bone" is defeated, reduces "Black Tide Sync Rate."
